dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Ishmael speaking. Is there anything I can help you with?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Ah, I was… doing my morning routine. I need to warm up my body for what’s to come.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: I make sure to have a balanced diet at all times. True professionals are not picky eaters.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Did you have an untroubled day, Manager? It looks like I can finally rest.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I know better than anyone about efficient mission planning and reconnaissance.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: One of the key qualities a manager must possess is the ability to utilize the ace members of their team.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: When carrying out missions, there’s nothing worse than charging in without a thought—like a certain someone. You need to anticipate every variable.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
I know—I know I can be obsessive about preplanning at times.
In my defense, however, you should be well aware that even a small mistake can lead to discordance and consequently a total wipeout.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Occasionally… your capabilities reassure me, Manager. But at the same time, it leaves me with this empty feeling.
Thinking about my old teammates—they couldn’t even be given a proper burial…

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: A promotion? Yes, I was aware of it. …I do suppose I owe you some thanks.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Sigh… Have you gone off to clean up after the others again?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Mission confirmed, now on stand-by.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Preparations are complete. Awaiting orders.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: …Wilco.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Engaging the target.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Target incapacitated.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ah!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Target neutralization confirmed.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: …Medic, don’t we have a medical team?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Ahem, reporting in that we’re all clear.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Mission status… failure.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Mission complete. Returning to base per procedure. Out.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: This could earn me a medal… Ah, disregard this transmission! Mission complete. I-Ishmael, out!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: My methodology was flawless. If you’re looking for a reason we failed, kindly search elsewhere.
